content: emotional support dumpster fire supplies -4 mm hook -worsted weight yarn 4 weight cotton green grey red yellow and orange -safety eyes around 5mm is good - embroidery floss for mouth or one ply of yarn separated from a strand -stuffing -paper toothpick and hot glue for sign -tapestry needle abbreviations single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet chain= chain blo = back loop only flo = front loop only top make 1 in grey row 1 chain 7 in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet x 6 6 row 2 chain 1 turn work single_crochet x6 6 row 3 10 repeat row 2 6 bottom make 1 in green and leave a tail approximately two feet long row 1 chain 7 in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet x 6 6 row 2 chain 1 turn work single_crochet x6 6 row 3 10 repeat row 2 6 flames each will consist of 2 or 3 colors make 2 or more for a 3 colored flame start with yellow yarn -chain 5 in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch then single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet for a total of 4 stitches -next attach orange yarn with a slip_stitch to the first stitch on the yellow to start the second layer around make 4 single_crochet along outside of yellow stitches then chain 1 at the peak make 4 single_crochet along the other side of the yellow -next attach the red yarn to the 1st stitch of the orange with a slip_stitch make 5 single_crochet along the outside of the orange chain 2 at the peak and make a slip_stitch in the second chain from the hook make 5 single_crochet along the orange stitches you will use the tails from the flames and put them through the grey top piece tie the ends together on the underside to secure different looking flames can be made by adjusting the colors used and the number of stitches used feel free to get creative arms make 2 in green chain 7 in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet x 6 tails will be used to attach to the body body- stitches are worked in the round make 1 in green r1 the first round is worked around the edge of the grey top edge 1 with the short side of the grey top facing up attach green yarn with a slip_stitch to the right corner then make 6 single_crochet along the short side place one additional single_crochet in the corner 7 stitches total edge 2 continue working along the long side place 10 single_crochet along long edge and one additional single_crochet in the corner 11 stitches total edge 3 on the next short edge make 6 single_crochet along the side place one additional single_crochet in the corner edge 4- continue around with 10 single_crochet along the last edge place one additional single_crochet in the corner then slip_stitch into your original stitch 11 stitches on this edge you should have 36 stitches in this first round r2 blo 36 single_crochet
